author: gdamour
msg: JMX GBeanInvokers implement the same attribute naming conventions than the Raw ones.
Previously the JMX GBeanInvokers were following the JMX standards. As pointed out by Dain,
this was an issue as remote MBean proxies were using the JMX GBeanInvokers. Hence, remote MBean
proxies of GBeanMBeans were not working properly.

author: gdamour
msg: Apply patch GERONIMO-270 submitted by Toby Cabot.
DynamicGBeanDelegate implements the same attribute naming conventions than Raw and JMX GBeanInvokers.
